## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                           | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `alignment`    | `alignment`    |                                                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `borderradius` | `borderradius` | Define the radius of the corners with a pixel amount. | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `css`          | `css`          | Additional CSS applied to the image element           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `ishidden`     | `ishidden`     |                                                       | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `url`          | `url`          |                                                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `width`        | `width`        | Define the width of the image with a pixel amount.    | `number`  | `undefined` |
